choices: Embrace him for his body heat.
The boy does something on his own accord.
1.content:
The lone knight wandering across the lands knew that he must find a squire to help him through his long journeys and his lonely nights, someone who will be loyal to him and be honest with him.

Long ago he fought in the Crusades and was highly honored and respected but that life was long ago and now he wanders through life in search of the right company.

Tonight he wanders into a small village with no name and just a few households searching for food and shelter from the cold.

Once inside of the small village, he dismount his heavily armoured Horse and ties him to a nearby tree and walks up to the first house. Knocking on the door, a young boy looking short and skinny and fear in his eyes when he encounters the large knight " Y..ye..yes Sir what can I do for you ?" Asked the frightened boy, looking inside you see his mother and father at the dinner table and requested lodging and food for the night.

The father of the young boy quickly answers the door and invites you inside, after making some small talk the father welcomed you in and food to eat, then when all had been introduced you paid the father 10 gold pieces for food and bed.

During dinner the boy was smitten with you, A real knight here in his humble abode, the boy had taken his newly aquired knight to his bed, which was also the young boys bed, and started taking his clothes off getting ready for sleep, the large Knight also began undressing himself and the boy could not look away.
The Knight got a rush watching the boy follow his every move and when the knight was down to his underwear he found that the boy was still staring at him with wide eyes and an open mouth.

Laying down now beside of the boy, the knight began to swell up with the boys body heat and his smooth body laying beside of him.
The boy also noticed this and asked if the kind knight needed any help sleeping after such a long ride.

The knight saw in the boys eyes that he would do anything that was asked of him and so the large knight asked him.....
1.title: Knight Rescue
